name: Bun Bao Beat
description:
Bun Bao Beat is a rhythm cooking game! 

Use WASD or the arrow keys to hit the notes on time to wrap dumplings.

Bun Bao Beat was created during the 2019 Global Game Jam. The theme was "what makes you think of home?". Our answer was food.

Linden Reid - code

Kytana Le - art

Lucien Ye - music
